name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#**, **.NET framework**, and **NoSQL databases** such as **MongoDB**, **Cassandra**, and **Cosmos DB**. Skilled in building **cloud-native development** solutions, implementing **event-driven architecture**, and using **messaging systems** for efficient service orchestration.

Expert in designing and developing **RESTful APIs** in accordance with **OpenAPI specs** and employing automated testing frameworks like **NUnit** and **MSTest** for robust application performance. Experienced with **Git**, **CI/CD tools** including **Jenkins**, **Azure DevOps**, and **GitHub Actions** to streamline development workflows. Familiar with observability tools like **Datadog** and **Grafana** to enhance application performance monitoring.

Strong background in front-end technologies such as **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and frameworks like **Angular** and **React**. Capable of working with both relational databases, including **SQL Server** and **MySQL**, as well as implementing **microservices architecture**. Adept in **identity and access management** protocols such as **OAuth**, **JWT**, and **SAML**. Excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills, complemented by meticulous attention to detail and the ability to work independently.

Designed and implemented efficient data models using **MongoDB** and **SQL Server**, ensuring optimal performance and scalability in applications with high data input/output.
Created and managed CI/CD pipelines with **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions**, automating testing and deployment processes to achieve a **95%** success rate in production releases.
Utilized containerization technologies such as **Docker** and orchestration tools like **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)** to enhance application deployment flexibility and reliability in a cloud-native environment.

Executed rigorous testing strategies using automated testing frameworks like **NUnit** and **MSTest**, achieving comprehensive test coverage and ensuring product quality.
Leveraged observability tools including **Datadog** and **Grafana** for monitoring application performance and diagnostics, facilitating proactive issue resolution.
Integrated Identity and Access Management solutions utilizing **OAuth**, **JWT**, and **SAML** for secure user authentication and authorization within applications.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to conduct code reviews and maintain high coding standards, demonstrating strong communication and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve technical challenges.

- Developed RESTful APIs following **OpenAPI specs** to facilitate seamless communication between services, utilizing **microservices architecture** principles.
- Designed asynchronous programming patterns and implemented multithreading techniques to optimize application performance, achieving a response time reduction of over **30%**.
- Led the development of event-driven architecture incorporating **RabbitMQ** and **Azure Service Bus** for real-time operations, ensuring a reliable messaging system across critical workflows.
- Created robust ETL pipelines for processing financial data, leveraging **Azure Data Factory** and **Apache Airflow** to support both batch and real-time data ingestion, improving data availability by **50%**.
- Architected and deployed a cloud-native solution on **Azure** with containerization technologies like **Docker** and orchestration via **Kubernetes**, reducing deployment times from **hours to minutes**.
- Integrated automated testing frameworks like **NUnit** and **MSTest** into CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions**, increasing code quality and reducing bugs by **40%** on release.
- Implemented observability tools such as **Datadog** and **Grafana** to monitor system performance and user interactions, resulting in a **20% improvement** in operational efficiency.
- Collaborated on the design of user-centric front-end applications using modern frameworks like **React** and **Angular**, ensuring a high-quality user experience across devices.
- Managed identity and access management (IAM) protocols utilizing **OAuth**, **JWT**, and **SAML** for securing applications and safeguarding sensitive financial data while maintaining compliance.

Developed and maintained robust backend systems using **C#**, **.NET Framework**, and **RESTful APIs** to ensure high performance and reliability for various applications.
Implemented **NoSQL databases** such as **MongoDB**, **Cassandra**, and **Cosmos DB**, supporting scalable data storage solutions that can handle millions of transactions, optimizing data retrieval with efficiencies of up to **85%**.
Practiced **asynchronous programming**, **multithreading**, and **parallelism** to ensure that applications remain responsive and efficient under heavy loads.
Engineered cloud-native applications utilizing **Azure** and **AWS** services, achieving deployment speeds that cut roll-out times by more than **50%**.
Designed and executed event-driven architectures with reliable messaging systems, improving system responsiveness and reducing latency in exiting workflows by **35%**.
Created and documented OpenAPI specs to streamline API design processes, facilitating easier integration and enhancing collaboration between cross-functional teams.
Utilized built-in features in **Git** and **Jenkins** as part of the **CI/CD tools** strategy, ensuring consistent deployment practices that improved our release cycles, reducing bugs in production by **40%**.
Applied automated testing frameworks like **NUnit** and **MSTest**, leading to a **30%** increase in code coverage and overall application stability.
Monitored and improved application performance using **observability tools** like **Datadog** and **Grafana**, contributing to a **25%** increase in operational uptime.
Implemented Identity and Access Management (IAM) practices with **OAuth** and **JWT** to secure user data and application access, ensuring GDPR compliance and the protection of sensitive information.
Leveraged **microservices architecture** for enhanced application modularity, allowing for independent development and deployment of services, leading to faster iterations and reduced downtime.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, employing strong problem-solving and communication skills to exceed project goals and timelines consistently.
